Articles.Content:
This is my remake of the Boeing CST-100 that Boeing entered into NASA's Commercial Crew Program (CCP) that was designed to transfer crew to and from the International Space Station.

Only three mods are required: Deployable Airbags. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/83134-23-5-Deployable-Airbags-%28plugin-version%29-v0-1-3-2014-06-18

RealChute. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57988-1-0-2-Wenkel-Corporation-RealChute-Parachute-Systems-v1-3-2-3-2-05-15

And TweakScale (thanks pTrevTrevs) http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/80234-0-90-TweakScale-Rescale-Everything!-%28v1-50-2014-12-24-10-40-UTC%29

If You Want Me To Recreate Any More Craft, Just Let Me Know

Tips: Heatshield Will Separate When Parachutes Fully Deploy

When Heatsheild Has Separated, Press 1 To Inflate Airbags

Pic: http://imgur.com/CNoYcfH

download link: https://www./?r91gs9mreob8esi

Edited May 26, 2015 by BananaIsAFruit
added tweakscale in mod list
oh, here is the download https://www./?r91gs9mreob8esi
It looks like Tweakscale is also required, for that smaller second stage fuel tank.

It looks like Tweakscale is also required, for that smaller second stage fuel tank.
oh yeah, thanks. ill add it on
